segments.text: See how many people are here !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah ! Do all these people work in the company ? Everyone and their dog is here !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Other than the employees , our boss Jack invited some friends of the company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can we just sit wherever we want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course not ! We have to sit at our assigned seats . I think our table is over there in the back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm . We don't exactly have the best seats in the house , do we ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look who you get to sit next to--Tim from purchasing !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Www ! That weirdo ? ! He really gives me the creeps !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry . I'm also sitting next to you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just hope he doesn't start bragging again !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't wait until we get our year-end bonus !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me , either ! Who decides how much money we get ?
segments.speaker: S2
